website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight at only 16 pounds with compact design for on-the-go masseurs. The 2-inch thick, multi-layer cushioning system is comfortable for clients, and vinyl covering is easy to wipe down.
pros: Multi-layer foam is comfortable yet firm for a relaxing experience
Multi adjustable chair made from durable industrial tubing
Can support weights of up to 300 pounds
Includes a nylon carry case that is strong and durable, making this chair highly portable
cons: Some users discovered some flaws in the stitch work and gluing of the vinyl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: I want to love my new massage chair as it is super light & great in every way but one! The headrest where it attaches to the chair itself has a flaw. One of the main screws that postions the headrest up or down will not tighten. Not sure if it's the threads or what but it is a main component as without this piece secure, the clients head is not properly positioned. Going to contact the company for a replacement or I'm sending it back, as you cannot use it this way. Sad as it's super amazing in every other way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after trying a Master Massage Portable Chair. The Master Massage chair was very heavy, though it was wide and comfortable for clients. I returned the Master Massage chair for this one. I am very pleased. As a massage therapist, I often do chair massage events. So far this chair has been to three events. It has held up well and clients have found it comfortable. It was easy to set up and adjust. Th lightweight of the chair is a huge plus. The bag seems sturdy enough. I am sure I will continue to get use out of this chair over the next several years.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we were tired of renting one for my husband's eye surgery recoveries. (He is a licensed chiropractor so it will be used for that as well.) It is very easy for me to lift and maneuver (he couldn't do any lifting after his retina surgeries). Set up is a breeze, also. The price was great...it has already paid for itself in terms of renting the others. Hopefully, we won't need it for any more surgeries, but it will be nice to have for sitting adjustments!
customer_reviews.author: terrih

customer_reviews.title: I am really pleased with this massage chair because I got a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this massage chair because I got a great deal on the price. It has no bells and whistles but is comfortable, light, and easy to set up. It is of high quality, just like you would expect from any Earthlite product. Be careful, the rubber feet on the legs of this chair pop out easily. I almost lost one the last time I pulled the chair out of it's carrying case. Other than that... this is perfect. All components work well- face cradle, sternum pad, and carry case are all functional and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: vflygirl

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of spending the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a daughter who just became licensed and she loves it. Every review I looked for a ton of different massage chairs had too many negatives. While not the cheapest one around it's not the most expensive and good quality. I believe this will hold up for her for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dano,

customer_reviews.title: This chair is very comfortable and worked fairly well for a vitrectomy head down ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very comfortable and sturdy and worked fairly well for a vitrectomy head down post surgery recovery. It is lightweight and easy to move. The only aspect which could be improved upon is the opening for the face - it is a little narrow and in my opinion should be wider or even better, adjustable. If this could be improved upon, I would rate it 5 star and recommend as an alternative to renting a vitrectomy chair for recovery from macular hole surgery. Order ahead though, as one day shipping does not mean one day delivery...
customer_reviews.author: Margaret K.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice massage chair
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice charming massage chair. I had master massage's chair and somehow it didn't adjust well for small client but this has a good adjustment and very comfortable. I'm looking forward for next chair massage event!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a solid portable massage chair look no further. This chair is very comfortable, well priced (you get exactly what you pay for), and sturdy. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: BDawg 1536

customer_reviews.title: The cover disintegrates in water
customer_reviews.text: After getting some coconut oil on the chair i thought it would be easier to spray it off in the shower. After washing it with a LOOFAH and DOVE SOAP it covering started to disintegrate. If you buy this, don't wash it. Let all of the grease and nasty build up I guess it will be extra cushion. 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: michael g.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price, very sturdy... the adjustments are a little wonky, but I've found that's the case with a lot of massage chairs. So, I wouldn't hold that against it. Highly recommend, especially with the carrying bag included.
customer_reviews.author: GaVaHokie

customer_reviews.title: It's durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair thinking it would be a better suit for me compared to my Master massage chair however I thought wrong. This chair is much more wider and not as sturdy. The carrying bag is extra tight so you always have to squeeze in the chair and there's no room to add supplies. Other than that it's ok. My old chair is still going strong after 5 yrs, it was only the fabric that needed to be repaired. I should've stuck with Master massage brand but wanted to try something new.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: It Works Great
customer_reviews.text: For what I need it for it works great. The chair is pretty light weight though but it's very good quality and very durable as well. While sitting on it, my Clients are very comfortable and it enables me to get the job done with ease. It's user friendly for sure.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: COMPANY LIES ABOUT LIFETIME WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: Product lists: LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY: Full lifetime warranty on the frame, 3 years warranty on the cushions and upholstery. From the company: "After the review, unfortunately this case cannot cover under warranty. Warranty covers the defect of ours, for example, if you’ve received the item broken like this, it should be covered. " I will be contacting the FTC and my state's attorney general, and filing a claim in court, this is unacceptable, and blatant false advertisement
customer_reviews.author: Nexus

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I looked at some of the cheaper models but I have a medical office and will be using this professionally. The extra money is worth it. Appears bullet proof while being a nice looking piece.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Cassone

customer_reviews.title: Love my chair. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, very sturdy, very comfortable. Perfect price. Folds up and has a great case for travel. I'm very happy. Definitely recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: bridget mehrtens

customer_reviews.title: Easy sit up!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Prime is amazing! Placed my order on Friday and it was delivered on Monday. 2. The chair is Perfect!! Super easy to set up! Very light but sturdy! Comes with a beautiful carrying case and the strap can be used on the chair alone for easy transport. The padding is ample and of great quality. I am so glad I chose this chair! Excited to use it in my practice !!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Peeling away after storage
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, soft, and sturdy folding chair. I kept it really well and clean during usage. It was stored away in its zipper bag in the closet for a couple of years (no moisture, indoor condition), and found it started peeling away! The peeling areas were touching the folding parts. Exposing the black flaky underneath, it crumbles and gets flakes everywhere. I'm disappointed that it would detoriate like this over age... FYI!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not substantially made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair in Jan it is light which is nice but tends to be squeaky, tenuous with bigger people on chair and the rubber stoppers on the feet have smashed or broken apart. For the price was not very cheap would have like something built a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: cfk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable, adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife on our anniversary. She loves it, and the massage she gets from me after a hard day on her feet at work. She can't lie flat on a massage table due to her acid reflux, so this chair is just what she needed. Sturdy, comfortable, adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hawthorn Binkley

customer_reviews.title: Uneven quality/ Terrible Armrest
customer_reviews.text: The rubber foot fell off during my first use. Without it the chair sits unevenly, so now i have to keep track of a small piece of rubber? For my 300$ brand new chair? The armrest is too low, i now use a pillow to bolster which looks not great and should not be necessary. I felt like I was making a strong professional choice spending the money on this chair and I am so disappointed. And now stuck w it. AND! The travel bag is a piece of crap and a nightmare to try to maneuver the chair fully into.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: If you're a professional invest in something more sturdy. I returned this chair after it first came ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're a professional invest in something more sturdy. I returned this chair after it first came to me with a broken part and then after sitting on it realized it is too flimsy for the weight of many customers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for massage and mobile gaming!
customer_reviews.text: This massage chair is perfect in every way! Fits my clients, adjustable in lot of ways. Additionally, it’s also great for mobile gaming! I play pubg a lot. And I would just sit on this chair to play pubg all day. My back is straight, my neck is straight. I don’t get headaches anymore from mobile games anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Qiying

customer_reviews.title: I love the chair
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair, but the carrying case would be better if it had wheels. The chair is great, though.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B. Steadman

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Light and easy to carry. Folds up nicely for storage in provided carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: I.S. Neko

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust the carry bag, useless.
customer_reviews.text: The chair is fine. I worry about the plastic tightening levers and parts breaking over time. Two stars removed for the bag, the handle of which broke the third time I transported the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Courtnee Fallon Rex

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good chair for the money. It is very easy to set up and easy transport in the bag. I have used it at several professional events and for the most part it has held up nicely. Reasons for 4 stars instead of 5: The chair seems a little wobbly for really tall/large clients. Also, my second time using the chair one of the plastic knob covers on the screws to adjust the chest pad broke off - parts of the chair are cheap. Overall though, this chair has paid for itself and is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: JaneJane

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this Earthlite!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Earthlite massage table which I love, so when it was time to invest in a chair I saught out Earthlite as well. This product is sturdy, beautiful and oh so comfortable. The height works great for me, and I am 5'8". The only con is that the handle strap on the carrying case broke almost immediately. Luckily, the shoulder strap is more properly sewn to the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Wish their carry bag also durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect it carry bag quality is very poor broke in 2nd time when I carry
customer_reviews.author: Karuna

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This chair has worked great for me for me when I go to a business an give massages. The only complaint I hear from clients is that sometimes it doesn't fit their face correctly. It can be adjusted and that usually takes care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair! Super light! I wish the bag had wheels but because it’s so light I’ll manage.
customer_reviews.author: IAMSKILLZ

customer_reviews.title: Solid chair
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair, especially for the price. The only thing is, the face rest is a little flimsy - it doesn’t lock in to the rest of the chair very securely. It is also pretty hard to get back into the carrying case. Other than that, it’s really comfortable and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Corsello

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: My Wife and I bought this for our daughter, who is a massage therapist. She is very pleased with it and has already started using it.
customer_reviews.author: The Hamiltonian

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU
customer_reviews.text: I have had the cheapie $70 chairs and this one is perfect. Very sturdy and comfortable. We just bought this for our home use. The massage fees good and it is a great angle. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a chair and shopped around. This chair was and is the best value.
customer_reviews.author: kevshands

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair. I have used it for many events so far and it has held up well. I wish there were more instructions but I was able to figure it out easy enough. It’s incredibly light and very easy to set up once you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Very happy to have gotten this one
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of going cheap for my first massage chair and instantly regretted it. Very happy to have gotten this one. If you're on the fence about price, save and come back for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cirrus

customer_reviews.title: Product damage/ wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product but I was more than disappointed to have a bag that’s too small and a part of the foot that was broken upon arrival. please send me the proper bag size.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra McQuoid

customer_reviews.title: worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I do chair massages at my gym and my clients and I love the feel of this chair...It's super lightweight to carry as well...if I were to give any criticism it would be that I have challenges putting the chair back in the case when I'm done...something is always sticking out...
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: The quality was there just wasn't comfortable for me. Price was great and the service too.
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't as comfortable as some,but was made well and it has fast service. The
customer_reviews.author: Barb Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic pain and this chair is just like the one they use at my chiropractor. It's nice to have one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: what a great chair! light, easy to move, and has been very helpful with helping me rehab from acute flair of neck arthritis by allowing me to rest head in different positions to take strain off of my neck and be able to get upright. have also found that I can play card games for short periods of time in this chair.
customer_reviews.author: M2J3

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This chair is exactly what I wanted. Very sturdy and easy to put together! Very light. Its like carrying a bunch of pillows. I recommend this chair to anyone who wants a good reliable chair!
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The double pole face cradle is stable enough for deeper pressure. Whole chair is light weight and portable.
customer_reviews.author: D.Casey

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair, it's so freaking light and easy to use. It fits in the carry bag so easily and it adjusts without any complications. I'd recommend this chair to any massage therapist.
customer_reviews.author: wiseone43

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair! Light enough to carry around
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair! Light enough to carry around, yet sturdy. Small folded size makes it easy to transport in my small car.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Good quality products always pay off.
customer_reviews.text: Earthlite says it all. Very good quality product. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair at affortable price. Set up is quick and easy, and very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Silvia

customer_reviews.title: love this massage chair!
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy and very nice chair. i would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dan m.

customer_reviews.title: Good value and great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable massage chair that is light enough to take everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S. O'connor

customer_reviews.title: Vitrectomy Necessity
customer_reviews.text: Strong enough for big man, yet folds up easily and weighs only 15 pounds. Cost about the same to buy as to rent for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This chair has gotten me through many a-marketing event and for such a low price, you honestly can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Mykle Beck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manage. Lightweight. Solid. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and sturdy. I found it very easy to maneuver while clients on the chair. Clients find it comfortable. Very lightweight to carry to and fro.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Well built and very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair! Sturdy and well put together but also light. Extremely adjustable. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: SynePDX

customer_reviews.title: and is sturdy. The only reason I didn't give it a ...
customer_reviews.text: It works, and is sturdy. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because it is not completely comfortable. . . :-)
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair massage!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it’s very good for my back while performance massage, easy to store and load! It was worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Irma Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: This chair has beed so good to me in the month that I've had it
customer_reviews.text: This chair has beed so good to me in the month that I've had it. I've had lots of success with each client. It's comfrotable, easy to set up/ take down, and pretty light to carry to and from work. Great chair, great company!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hagglund

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair. I wish the arm support would adjust higher for small clients.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I love my chair and so do my clients
customer_reviews.text: I love my chair and so do my clients! It was a bit more than other chairs but affordable and just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Toya Irene

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have my own mobile Massage Therapy business and this chair is everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Steph L

customer_reviews.title: Would like some fabric covers for the rest of the cushions
customer_reviews.text: Soft case can be cubersome getting back into. But overall there's no real issue. Would like some fabric covers for the rest of the cushions, not just the face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Massage Chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair and easy to put together and travels well!
customer_reviews.author: Sparico

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance uses it for her massages on the side and she said the chair works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: 512rattler

customer_reviews.title: Was a little bummed but for the cost it's still a good investment.
customer_reviews.text: Padding not as thick as the exact one I bought 7 years ago. Was a little bummed but for the cost it's still a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I do corporate chair massage , indeed it has been easy to carry, set up & very comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design is much better now, very easy to fold up when finished
customer_reviews.text: Used to own an Earthlite chair back in the 90's. Design is much better now, very easy to fold up when finished, and easy to adjust for different size people. A+ in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Tang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the best massage chair I have used. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This chair came with everything you need including the bag! I've done several chair events with this chair and it's held up great. It's not super light, but not too heavy either. Really great chair for the price!
customer_reviews.author: twokyboysmama

customer_reviews.title: Extremly easy to fold up and make adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Very light but durable. Extremly easy to fold up and make adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! I really love the style and durability
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! I really love the style and durability. Fast and friendly shipping! Sid from a back rub company....you rock my Amazon world! Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle A Webb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight and easy to set up and adjust. Very comfortable for clients!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Seems very sturdy since some larger people were on it and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for an impromptu chair event. So simple to unpack and pack up. Seems very sturdy since some larger people were on it and it held up well. No shaking or instability. I recommend this for any first chair. It may end up being your first and only.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaHV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and comfortable. Great padding, easy to adjust and fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Stefania

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy for my peeps. Adjusts and is light enough to take with me
customer_reviews.author: Pamela powers

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and in excellent shape.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and as expected. Very high quality and in excellent shape.
customer_reviews.author: KoryC

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Light weigh easy to carry. Very pleased with quality. Not for heavy large clients hard for them to get in and out of. Normal size clients it works well for.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my chair. It's very light weight and easy to set up and breakdown. It's exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: MeshaEdwards

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: I love working with this chair, there are times where I wish things would move a wee bit more. But overall, very well made chair would buy again, and the removable sternum pad comes in handy even on the massage table for women.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Getting down to bidness
customer_reviews.text: This item is very light yet durable. The chair is easy to set up and the seat and arm rests are sturdy. I am not afraid they are going to fall, How embarrassing! The case is sturdy and easy to carry as a carrying case should be.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K. Self

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to carry and set up. Great for events! Perfect weight!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Great for Recuperation of Retina surgery
customer_reviews.text: Item was purchased for recuperation from a detached Retina it was ideal in that the head must be kept down for 45 minutes of each hour which can be quite uncomfortable this made it much more comfortable and with the help of 2 mirrors the patient can watch telivision to pass the time
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable. It's light and easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: I want to lay in this chair even when no massage is being given!! It's very comfortable. It's light and easy to transport!
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Great designed.  Very Dedependable.  Use it at a convention and did many chair massage. Very Dedependable.  Use it at a c Never
customer_reviews.text: Very dependable. Did a convention last weekend where I did many chair massage. No conplaints. Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN R O'CONNOR

customer_reviews.title: Worst chair masdage chair ive ever owned fell apart from ...
customer_reviews.text: Worst chair masdage chair ive ever owned fell apart from day 1 now ruined and only used handful of times if there was a zero star that would be better
customer_reviews.author: katrina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Had some difficulties with delivery, but was well worth the wait. Chair is great professional quality, easy to set up, easy to move and store. Would have been nice if it came with a started kit with a book or CD of massage techniques and massage oil.
customer_reviews.author: RacinRabit

customer_reviews.title: I love my massage chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Earthlite is the best! I love my massage chair!!!!!! Light, easy to set up and break down, great quality, comfortable....Earthlite thought of everything when they created this equipment! The headrest is fantastic too!
customer_reviews.author: SanPa

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: I am an LMT. I like this chair. My co-worker has also been using this chair. Solid construction. Had a different(less expensive) brand chair break under use, not so good for my client...
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Owen

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this chair after reading all the other positive reviews. The seat is so unstable! Any movement or adjusting once your weight is on the seat makes the whole seat, seat bar, and leg rests move A LOT. I was afraid my 180lb body was going to break it. There's no way I would trust this to be safe for my heavier gym people. Sending back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful massage chair
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy with heavier clients. Very lightweight for carrying. Sets up and folds easily. Haven't had it long enough to address longevity with use. Hopefully that will be good as well.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: beautiful massage chair color is true to photo a rich ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful massage chair color is true to photo a rich purple shade, soft fitting cushions very sturdy. Great price as well for this brand mass chair.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my salon
customer_reviews.text: It's everything it was supposed to be. Perfect for my salon.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Love This Chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Very comfortable to be on and extremely light weight to move/carry yet very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair. I use it often and its held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Gail S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Broken Headrest Adjustment Knob
customer_reviews.text: My massage chair was delivered with a broken headrest adjustment knob. I need this massage chair for public use and this next weekend. I hope Earthlite can overnight a replacement part ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Victor J. Mettler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and the price was right. It shipped on time as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Selling broken chairs.
customer_reviews.text: This chair was BROKEN IN HALF UPON receiving. The bar that goes behind the chest piece was completely broken in half. Ridiculous. I can't believe anyone would sell a broken item and try and get away with it. Don't waste your money like I did so someone can rip you off.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality lightweight
customer_reviews.text: High quality kneeling massage chair so comfortable you could fall asleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: CMS

product_meta.title: EARTHLITE Portable Massage Chair Package VORTEX - Portable, Compact, Strong and Lightweight incl. Carry Case, Sternum Pad & Strap (15lbs)
product_meta.description:
Using incredibly strong oval tube aluminum construction, EARTHLITE has created a stylish, compact and lightweight massage chair; probably the lighted chair on the market. Chair only weighs 15lbs! 

Your EARTHLITE Vortex portable massage chair will be a place of healing and energy – the perfect portable venue for massage therapists, sports therapists and more. It folds easily, comes with a rugged nylon carry case with a padded shoulder strap and a sternum pad. The dual-density quality upholstery and various adjustment options will provide the highest comfort to your clients while being incredibly durable.
feature_bullets: COMPLETE PORTABLE MASSAGE CHAIR PACKAGE: Includes EARTHLITE Vortex Chair, Rugged Nylon Carry Case, Padded Shoulder Strap, and Sternum Pad.

TRAVELS EASILY, LIGHTEST CHAIR ON THE MARKET: Only 15 lbs! The innovative oval frame is forged from light and strong aircraft grade aluminum. Compact design folds easily, stores and totes in a sturdy nylon carry case.

INCREDIBLY COMFORTABLE: The EARTHLITE Vortex Massage Chair is upholstered with high quality, dual density Pro-Lite cushioning and buttery soft Natursoft upholstery for superior comfort and durability.

EASY TO USE AND ADJUST: Multiple face, arm and seat adjustments enable optimal client positioning. Quick setup with simple facecradle armrest and seat adjustments to accommodate all client sizes. Folds compactly.

PROFESSIONAL QUALITY: Made by EARTHLITE, the world’s leading and most trusted massage equipment company, since 1987. LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY: Full lifetime warranty on the frame, 3 years warranty on the cushions and upholstery.
